channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Travel Engine – Travel and Tour Booking Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Travel Engine – Travel and Tour Booking Plugin

item.title: CVE-2021-24680|2024-08-03T19:42:16.108Z -- unknown -- wp%20travel%20engine%20%E2%80%93%20travel%20and%20tour%20booking%20plugin
item.description: The WP Travel Engine WordPress plugin before 5.3.1 does not escape the Description field in the Trip Destination/Activities/Trip Type and Pricing Category pages, allowing users with a role as low as editor to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks, even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed
